__DOCUMENTATION__.sorry: json has no native documentation formatting. This will do

formatting.keeping tidy: please prefix command specific strings with COMMANDNAME_ as this getting collisions.
formatting.grouping: please keep any general strings (not bound to a specific command) at the top
formatting.inline variables: you can include variables by enclosing their name in {NAME}. You can see which variables are availible for which command by checking where the label is used
